ARABIC: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيْنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُوا۟ وَهَلْ نُجَٰزِىٓ إِلَّا ٱلْكَفُورَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is how We repaid them for their ingratitude. Are any but the ungrateful repaid like this?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That is how We requited them for their ingratitude. We only punish those who are ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus did We retribute them for their ingratitude. And none do We retribute in this manner except the utterly ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This was how We recompensed them for their ungratefulness and thus do We recompense the ungrateful ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We gave them this reward – the recompense of their ingratitude; and whom do We punish, except the ungrateful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Like this We requited them because they were ungrateful disbelievers. And never do We requite in such a way except those who are ungrateful (disbelievers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This We requited them with because they disbelieved; and We do not punish any but the ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thus We recompensed them for their unbelief; and do 'We ever recompense any hut the unbeliever?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This We awarded them because of their ingratitude. Punish We ever any save the ingrates?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We requited them in that way because of their ingratitude. We requite no one in that way but the ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In this wise We requited them for they were ungrateful. And We requite not thus any save the ungrateful infidels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We requited them with that for their ingratitude. Do We not requite ingrates?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That was the Requital We gave them because they ungratefully rejected Faith: and never do We give (such) requital except to such as are ungrateful rejecters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Like this We requited them because they were ungrateful disbelievers. And never do We requit in such a way except those who are ungrateful, (disbelievers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such We recompensed them for their disbelief; do We recompense any except the unbelievers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We thus penalized them for their ingratitude. Would We penalize any but the ungrateful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [By] that We repaid them because they disbelieved. And do We [thus] repay except the ungrateful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [34:17] That, replacement [of what they had], is what We requited them with for their ingratitude: and is anyone but the ingrate ever [so] requited? (read hal yujāzā illā’l-kafūru; or read as hal nujāzī illā’l-kafūra, ‘Would We requite anyone but the ingrate?’), in other words, it is only the like of such who is called to account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: This We awarded them) What befell them was a punishment (because of their ingratitude) for the blessings of Allah. (Punish We ever any save the ingrates) those who are ungrateful towards Allah and towards His blessings?
